con:testCase.name: GoodCase-DEV-chargeCustomer-Threshold-New-OCS-DRC-382
con:testCase.con:description:
To implement tests: For 1:
Call walletThresholdEventExtNot with unknown serviceProviderId -> Expected: Response=true, Taks Nr. 5 is not created. For 3: Call walletThresholdEventExtNot with exist and correct serviceProviderId and allowed threshold-value. Expected: -> Expected: Response=true, Taks Nr. 5 is created. Testcase for 3: UpdateDDParameters for tenant/brand with threshold value ex. 400 register new customer charge threshold value 400 and validate result UpdateDDParameters for tenant/brand with threshold value ex. 500,1000,... (400 is moved) continue charge the same registered customer with threshold value = 400 Expected result: Task with id 5 must be created in TASK table
